channel.title: OS Paged Pool Memory Low Issue
channel.description: I need help or advice to help solve or improve a problem I have. Every time I play a steam game on my computer(mostly TF2) , I get in the top right corner, OS: Paged Pool Memory Low and sometimes results in the game crashing. I get this on every game exept Portal (obvious) and I have tried lowering the model texture and stuff in the options and that kind of helped stop the crashing but it still says that the paged pool memory is low and lags. Give me any advice besides a new graphics card. Note: This only happens on steam games and nothing else. Thank You.

item.title: OS Paged Pool Memory Low Issue
item.dc:creator: blackout
item.description:
you need more ram bscly. get a better PC, I dont know nuffin 'bout upgradic PCs n shit.

Read full topic
item.source: OS Paged Pool Memory Low Issue

item.title: OS Paged Pool Memory Low Issue
item.dc:creator: Paddy
item.description:
Page file won’t really help as said before. Writing to the hard drive (virtual memory) is a last option. Writing to the hard drive is so much slower than using physical RAM. Your best bet is to upgrade your RAM. It can be a very cheap fix depending on your memory type.

Read full topic

item.title: OS Paged Pool Memory Low Issue
item.dc:creator: Trickst4R
item.description:
FireTime:

How much ram do you have? And what is your page file set to?

To see your page file go to

ControlPanel>system>Advanced>Performance>Settings>Advanced>Virtual memory>Change

hey firetime i have teh same problem and i was wondering if you could help me. i have added you on steam to get in contact. thanks

Read full topic

item.source: OS Paged Pool Memory Low Issue

item.title: OS Paged Pool Memory Low Issue
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
ok, then your using an integrated video card (one that is built into the motherboard) The problem is that both your video card and you processor are competing for the available ram on your system. because of this your computer runs out of ram and it has to start loading large portions of the game into virtual ram.

Currently all we can do us bump up your virtual ram to 2x what is was. This is a Hack and it may not work (and it will severely hinder performance) What you need to do is get new ram as KMCA said. Also getting any type of dedicated GPU will also help your computer a ton. An older card like a nVidia7600/8600 will do wonders for your system.

Read full topic

you’ll need to upgrade your RAM, I had this issue on my old computer.

Upgrade like a download or upgrade like physical?
